languages.text: "Как никогда, Ваша Светлость. Они возмущены святотатственным вторжением и жаждут истребить скверну на глазах наших усопших предков. Мои бойцы обследуют боковые приделы склепа, чтобы вас не атаковали с флангов".

"Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."
languages.original_text: "Как никогда, Ваша Светлость. Они возмущены святотатственным вторжением и жаждут истребить скверну на глазах наших усопших предков. Мои бойцы обследуют боковые приделы склепа, чтобы вас не атаковали с флангов".

traits.locale_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

"Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

languages.text: « Absolument, Votre Seigneurie. Cette intrusion profane les a emplis de colère, et ils ont hâte d'exterminer la menace sous les yeux de nos défunts ancêtres. Mes prévôts se chargeront de sécuriser les côtés de la crypte pour empêcher tout ennemi de nous attaquer par le flanc. »
languages.original_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument, Votre Seigneurie. Cette intrusion profane les a emplis de colère, et ils ont hâte d'exterminer la menace sous les yeux de nos défunts ancêtres. Mes prévôts se chargeront de sécuriser les côtés de la crypte pour empêcher tout ennemi de nous attaquer par le flanc. »

languages.text: «Más que nunca, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Están enfurecidos por esta intrusión profana y arden en deseos de exterminar a la amenaza ante la mirada de nuestros ancestros caídos. Mis guardias asegurarán las secciones laterales de la cripta para prevenir flanqueos».
languages.original_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

traits.locale_text: «Más que nunca, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Están enfurecidos por esta intrusión profana y arden en deseos de exterminar a la amenaza ante la mirada de nuestros ancestros caídos. Mis guardias asegurarán las secciones laterales de la cripta para prevenir flanqueos».

languages.text: “他们前所未有地积极，大人。这种亵渎性的入侵行为让他们愤怒不已，他们渴望在我们已故祖先面前将威胁亲手消灭。我的人会负责守住地下墓穴的侧翼，防止敌人从左右两边包抄。”
languages.original_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

traits.locale_text: “他们前所未有地积极，大人。这种亵渎性的入侵行为让他们愤怒不已，他们渴望在我们已故祖先面前将威胁亲手消灭。我的人会负责守住地下墓穴的侧翼，防止敌人从左右两边包抄。”

languages.text: 「かつてないほどの準備が整いました、陛下。彼らはこの不敬な侵入に激怒し、亡き先祖の目の前で脅威を退治しようとしています。私のエンフォーサーたちは、側面からの攻撃を防ぐため、地下墓地の側面部分を確保します」
languages.original_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

traits.locale_text: 「かつてないほどの準備が整いました、陛下。彼らはこの不敬な侵入に激怒し、亡き先祖の目の前で脅威を退治しようとしています。私のエンフォーサーたちは、側面からの攻撃を防ぐため、地下墓地の側面部分を確保します」

languages.text: "Ich war noch nie so bereit, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie sind erzürnt über dieses unheilige Eindringen und begierig, die Gefahr vor den Augen unserer verstorbenen Ahnen auszulöschen. Meine Enforcers werden die seitlichen Bereiche der Krypta sichern, um Angriffe über die Flanken zu verhindern."
languages.original_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war noch nie so bereit, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie sind erzürnt über dieses unheilige Eindringen und begierig, die Gefahr vor den Augen unserer verstorbenen Ahnen auszulöschen. Meine Enforcers werden die seitlichen Bereiche der Krypta sichern, um Angriffe über die Flanken zu verhindern."

languages.text: "Hiç olmadıkları kadar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İnancımıza hakaret anlamına gelen bu istila nedeniyle son derece öfkeli, bu kötülüğü ölmüş atalarımızın gözleri önünde yok etmek için de son derece hevesliler. İnfazcılarım, mahzenin yan bölümlerini güvence altına alarak kanatlardan saldırı gelmesini engelleyecek."
languages.original_text: "Ready as never before, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are incensed by this profane intrusion and eager to exterminate the menace before the eyes of our departed ancestors. My enforcers will secure the side sections of the crypt to prevent any flanking attacks."
